mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER (ORDER_ID, ITEM_NUMBER, ITEM_COUNT, ORDER_PRICE) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{itemNumber}, #{itemCount}, #{orderPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_DATE, ITEM_NUMBER, ITEM_COUNT, ORDER_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE ITEM_NUMBER = #{itemNumber}
SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_DATE, I.ITEM_NUMBER, ITEM_COUNT, ORDER_PRICE, ITEM_NAME FROM TBL_ITEM I JOIN TBL_ORDER O ON ORDER_ID = #{orderId} AND I.ITEM_NUMBER = O.ITEM_NUMBER
SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_DATE, ITEM_NUMBER, ITEM_COUNT, ORDER_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER
SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') || ORDER_SEQ ORDER_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ORDER_SEQ, ORDER_DATE FROM TBL_ORDER_SEQ ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ORDER_SEQ SET ORDER_SEQ = ORDER_SEQ + 1 WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')
